Installation

install.Rmd

You can install scMEGA via below commands:

# Install devtools
if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("devtools")

# Install scMEGA
devtools::install_github("CostaLab/scMEGA", force = TRUE)
